mapper.select: SELECT MENU_NO AS "menuNo" , MENU_ORDR AS "menuOrdr" , MENU_NM AS "menuNm" , UPPER_MENU_NO AS "upperMenuId" , MENU_DC AS "menuDc" , RELATE_IMAGE_PATH AS "relateImagePath" , RELATE_IMAGE_NM AS "relateImageNm" , PROGRM_FILE_NM AS "progrmFileNm" FROM TN_FEIS_MENUINFO WHERE MENU_NM like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%') ORDER BY MENU_NO LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(MENU_NO) AS "totcnt" FROM TN_FEIS_MENUINFO WHERE MENU_NM like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
